import React from "react"; export default function About() { return (

Welcome to Wiggies

We're a marketplace for wig sellers and buyers

Our Mission

At Wiggies, our mission is to provide a platform where wig sellers can connect with buyers and create a seamless experience for both parties. We believe that everyone should have access to quality wigs, and we strive to make that a reality for our customers.

Our Vision

Our vision at Wiggies is to be the leading marketplace for wig sellers and buyers. We want to create a community where people can come together to find the perfect wig for their needs. Whether you're a first-time buyer or a seasoned wig enthusiast, we're here to help you find exactly what you're looking for.

); }
